statements: SELECT * FROM Assignments;
SELECT assignment_id, teacher_feedback FROM Assignments WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Assignments WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT * FROM Assignments ORDER BY teacher_feedback DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, student_id, grade FROM Assignments WHERE grade < 70 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Assignments;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Assignments WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT assignment_id, teacher_feedback FROM Assignments WHERE student_id = 1001;
SELECT assignment_id, teacher_feedback, grade FROM Assignments WHERE student_id = 1001 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM Assignments ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Assignments;
SELECT assignment_id, student_id, teacher_id FROM Assignments WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT teacher_id, COUNT(assignment_id) AS total_assignments FROM Assignments GROUP BY teacher_id;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM Assignments;
SELECT * FROM Assignments ORDER BY assignment_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE student_id=1;
SELECT assignment_id, teacher_id, grade FROM Assignments WHERE teacher_id=3 AND grade >= 90;
SELECT student_id, last_name, first_name FROM Students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT teacher_id, COUNT(assignment_id) AS num_assignments FROM Assignments GROUP BY teacher_id HAVING COUNT(assignment_id) > 2;
SELECT assignment_id, student_id, teacher_id, grade, feedback FROM Assignments;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM Teachers WHERE department = 'Math';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(assignment_id) AS num_assignments FROM Assignments GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_assignments > 2;
SELECT * FROM Assignments WHERE grade > 90
SELECT assignment_id, feedback FROM Assignments WHERE teacher_id = 101 ORDER BY assignment_id DESC
SELECT teacher_id, department FROM Teachers WHERE first_name = 'John'
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Assignments JOIN Students ON Assignments.student_id = Students.student_id WHERE Students.last_name = 'Doe'

SELECT * FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_id = 1;
SELECT assignment_name, grade FROM Assignments WHERE student_id = 101 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT teacher_id, COUNT(*) AS total_assignments FROM Assignments GROUP BY teacher_id;
SELECT * FROM Assignments WHERE grade > 90 AND feedback IS NOT NULL;

SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name, grade FROM Assignments WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT teacher_id FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT assignment_id, student_id, teacher_id, feedback FROM Assignments WHERE grade < 70 ORDER BY assignment_id DESC;

SELECT * FROM Assignments;
SELECT assignment_id, student_id, grade FROM Assignments WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT teacher_id, first_name, last_name FROM Teachers ORDER BY last_name ASC;

SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY first_name ASC

SELECT class_name, teacher_id FROM Classes WHERE teacher_id <> '56789'
